title: 15-minute POST-WORKOUT STRETCH for Injury Prevention & Flexibility
description:
Let's RELAX! After a tough workout, you deserve a refreshing post-workout stretch. Join me for 15 minutes as we work through several full-body stretches to increase your flexibility and decompress. Our stretch session will help to relieve tight muscles in your back, hips, upper body, and legs, and WOW it feels awesome to release those tight muscles! Stretching is a great way to prevent injuries and relieve low back aches so be sure to add this stretch often to your training regimen.

channelDescription:
Hello! I'm Kaleigh and I create CYCLE & STRENGTH training programs to challenge and transform you into an unstoppable force!

I'm here to help you BUILD CONFIDENCE THROUGH STRENGTH!

I am a certified Spin instructor, Stages Beats instructor, NASM certified personal trainer, and Girls Gone Strong Pre/ Postnatal coaching certified with over 13 years of experience coaching all over the world!

comments: i'm a 55 year old male and post a heavy shoulders and triceps workout i tried these stretches for the first time, 10 minutes after doing this i started to tremble all over and had to lay down for 30 minutes. when i got off my bed i felt great and 3 weeks later am noticing that both my flexibility and breathing are improving. thank you for helping to improve my life
I just looove your pug lying in the background on his own couch, with a picture and even a cushion of him <333 :D made my day! <3
I loved how the pug was sleeping in the back!!! My pug came up next to me and started snoozing too. This stretch felt sooooo good. Thank you!!!!❤❤❤❤
So glad you added the longer stretch at the end! So important. Thank you.
I have found my new trainer!  I am 52 year old, menopausal woman.  I want to build muscle with heavy weights but in safe non-impact way.  Kaleigh, your workouts are fantastic!  Thank you💪😀
